the act of stealing something from a place or a person by using violence, especially during war: They have survived a thousand years of floods, droughts, wars, pillage, and destruction. Several acts of intentional pillage, destruction, and burning were attributed to the parties in conflict. Synonyms
looting
plunder Compare
robbery
